name: World Series of Poker: Tournament of Champions
name_original: World Series of Poker: Tournament of Champions
description:
Building on last year's #1 poker title and #1 brand in poker, World Series of Poker: Tournament of Champions takes a story-based approach as you enter the Circuit as Chris “Jesus” Ferguson's protégé. You'll test your skill against more top pros than ever before as you compete in the premier Circuit Events.

Your goal: qualify for the winner-take-all, invitation-only Tournament of Champions at the Rio Resort in Las Vegas & lay claim as the World's Best! What's New for 2007!
